changeSet.author: slawomirbankowski
changeSet.createView: select algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationId, algorithmImplementation1.guid, algorithmImplementation1.insertedRowDate, algorithmImplementation1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeId, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmVersionId, algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationName, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationClass, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationDescription, algorithmImplementation1.scriptName, algorithmImplementation1.scriptParams , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmType_algorithmTypeId , algorithmType1.guid as algorithmType_guid , algorithmType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmType_insertedRowDate , algorithmType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmType_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeName as algorithmType_algorithmTypeName , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeDescription as algorithmType_algorithmTypeDescription , algorithmVersion1.algorithmVersionId as algorithmVersion_algorithmVersionId , algorithmVersion1.insertedRowDate as algorithmVersion_insertedRowDate , algorithmVersion1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmVersion_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmVersion1.guid as algorithmVersion_guid , algorithmVersion1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmVersion_algorithmTypeId , algorithmVersion1.algorithmVersionName as algorithmVersion_algorithmVersionName , executorType1.executorTypeId as executorType_executorTypeId , executorType1.guid as executorType_guid , executorType1.insertedRowDate as executorType_insertedRowDate , executorType1.lastUpdatedDate as executorType_lastUpdatedDate , executorType1.executorTypeName as executorType_executorTypeName , executorType1.executorTypeClass as executorType_executorTypeClass from algorithmImplementation algorithmImplementation1 join algorithmType algorithmType1 on algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeId = algorithmType1.algorithmTypeId join algorithmVersion algorithmVersion1 on algorithmImplementation1.algorithmVersionId = algorithmVersion1.algorithmVersionId join executorType executorType1 on algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId = executorType1.executorTypeId
